name: Today
description: Web based Todo list where every day is a new start.
author: zoreet

scripts.postinstall: rm -rf static/js/jquery.min.js && ln -s ../../node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js static/js/jquery.min.js && rm -rf static/js/moment.min.js && ln -s ../../node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js static/js/moment.min.js
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs static/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/main.js && uglifyjs static/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/main.min.js
scripts.start: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
